meanings.definition: The state or quality of being favorable.
meanings.sent1: The favorability of the weather made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: The favorability of the outcome was evident in the smiles of the team.
meanings.sent3: The favorability of the situation was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile radiated favorability, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The favorability of the news spread like wildfire, bringing joy to all.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is regarded with approval or preference.
meanings.sent1: The favorability of the new policy was welcomed by all employees.
meanings.sent2: His favorability among his peers was undeniable.
meanings.sent3: The favorability of the dessert was so high that people went back for seconds.
meanings.sent4: The favorability of her singing voice was compared to that of a nightingale.
meanings.sent5: The favorability of the product's reviews influenced many customers to make a purchase.
